title: Where are my KEY FRAGMENTS!!!??? I miss them rip.
body:
Hello to whoever reads this. 
I felt like posting this because it's been quite a long time since I've gotten a single key fragment. 
I don't think I am on a loot ban because I get chests but I'm not completely sure. 
I think it has been around 1-2 weeks (maybe more? not sure) since I've gotten one. 
Ever since the 10 ban system coming through, the requirement for the number of champs for 5 v 5 ranked changed to 20 naturally. 
I want to play ranked but I have 19 champions and I have two chests, 1/3 of a key (1 key fragment) and 800+ blue essence which increases my frustration. 

Maybe I'm super unlucky and whenever I play champions I don't own I was suppose to get a key fragment but don't get it and miss getting it when I play champions I actually own.  

Thanks in advance, {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I see that you've obtained around 7 key fragments so far.  The rate of key fragments are just like before the honor system.  The only difference now is the opportunity for additional key fragments through the new Honor capsules.  Sometimes you may need to relog the client as well to see the notice that you received them.  Nothing seems out of the ordinary here, you'll just have to continue playing!  I hope that helps!
